title: Overture: Linh from Vietnam
creator_credit: Seth Pinsker, Elaine Sperber and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Docudrama which tells about young Linh Tran and her family, who have settled into their first real home since immigrating to America from Vietnam. Discusses the social hardships they incur, the adjustments they must make to a new culture, and the girl’s friendship with a Mexican-American boy. Cast includes: Pandito Gomez, Kim Ngan Ly, Michael Leon and Stanley Brock
